attributes.action: Get railway companies to enforce the quiet coach rules more stringintly.
attributes.additional_details: If people want to use their mobiles' on a train, sit in any other coach other than the quiet coach. Train companies should either enforce the rule (Which they don't), block out phone signal's in a quiet coach or if they won't enforce it, then abandon it. Why have a quiet coach that isn't quiet?!
attributes.background: Many rail companies have quiet coaches but people persistently do not observe the rules.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of train companies, not the Government or Parliament.
